text: White Guard or White Guards may refer to: * Anti-Communist Volunteer Militia (Italy), in Slovene Bela Garda or Belogardisti * White Guard, the military arm of the Russian White movement ** The White Guard, a 1925 novel by Mikhail Bulgakov about the Russian White movement * White Guard (Finland), part of the White Army during the 1918 Finnish Civil War * The White Guard (TV series), a Russian TV series based on the novel by Bulgakov * White Guards, a name applied to the Slovene Home Guard ==See also== *White Guardian, a fictional character in Doctor Who
title: White Guard
